movierecording: 1280 x 720 pixels / 640 x 480 pixels / 320 x 240 pixels (30 frames/sec.) with monaural sound
exposuremode: Programmed AE, Shutter Priority AE, Aperture Priority AE, Manual exposure
focallength: f=4.3mm-103.2mm, equivalent to 24 – 576mm on a 35 mm camera
shutterspeed: (Auto mode) 1/4sec. to 1/2000sec., (All other modes) 8sec. to 1/2000sec. (with mechanical shutter)
imagesensor: 1/2.3 – inch CCD with primary color filter
lcdscreensize: 3.0-inch, approx. 230,000 dots, TFT color LCD monitor
ports: USB 2.0 High-Speed, NTSC / PAL with Monaural Sound, HDMI Mini Connector
